scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm build" "cd server && npm build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules" "cd client && rimraf node_modules build" "cd server && rimraf node_modules build"
scripts.install: (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.start: npm install concurrently && concurrently "cd client && npm install && npm build" "cd server && npm install && npm start"
